personality.translation[0].definitions[0: someone’s character, especially the way they behave towards other people
Despite their different personalities, they became the best of friends.
Unfortunately, the illness can lead to changes in personality.
personality.translation[0].definitions[1: someone who is very famous and often appears in the newspapers, on television etc, especially an entertainer or sports person
one of the most well-liked TV personalities
personality.translation[0].definitions[2: the qualities of character that make someone interesting or enjoyable to be with
He’s honest but he lacks personality.
personality.translation[0].definitions[3: someone who has a very strong character and is very different from other people
He was a dynamic personality in the business world.
personality.translation[0].definitions[4: the qualities which make a place or thing different and interesting
It’s partly the architecture which gives the town its personality.
personality.translation[0].note_box[0].s: Mercer has a strong personality and always tells you his opinion.
The architect’s forceful personality ensured that the work progressed rapidly.
He had a dominant personality and could be a bit of a bully.
Everyone who knew Roseanne will miss her warm personality.
The job requires someone with an outgoing personality.
He is strikingly handsome with a very engaging personality.
Her bright and bubbly personality made her one of the most popular girls in her year.
Her lively personality won her many admirers.
Like many other people, I was attracted by his charismatic personality.
She shares many of her mother’s personality traits.
The hospital treats patients with severe personality disorders.
The band eventually split because of personality clashes.
Employers are increasingly using personality tests to help them select staff.
personality.translation[1].definitions[0: an organization that from a legal point of view is separate from the people who own it or manage it
A company has a separate legal personality, and its members are not liable for its debts.
personality.translation[1].definitions[1: a product’s personality is the qualities that people think it has, considered as a whole
Gasoline has always been a tough sell, without much product personality.
